form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: IV-4 16224049, IMMIGRANT VISA AND ALIEN REGISTRATION

full_text: Screened by NARA, 6/2/2023 OPTIONAL FORM 155A, (Rev. 6-85) DEPT. OF STATE NSN 7540-01-126-7761 50155-203 IV- 41624049 IMMIGRANT VISA AND ALIEN REGISTRATION THE IMMIGRANT HAS BEEN PREVIOUSLY IN THE UNITED STATES OF: (Family Name) (First Name) (Middle Name) INS FILE #, IF KNOWN HERRERA PEREZ ADRIAN ACTION BY IMMIGRATION INSPECTOR THE IMMIGRANT NAMED ABOVE ARRIVED IN THE UNITED INELIGIBILITY FOR VISA STATES VIA (Name of vessel or flight no. of arrival) WAIVED UNDER SECTION 150 LOS PAH16 212(e) 212(h) 212(g) 212(i) CITY AND COUNTRY OF BIRTH MO-DAY-YR OF BIRTH @DMITTED IRS JUN27 1997 Santa Ana E1 Salvador 3-4-14 CITY AND COUNTRY OF LAST RESIDENCE NATIONALITY Santa Ana E1 Salvador Salvadoran MARITAL STATUS MOTHER'S FIRST NAME FATHER'S FIRST NAME M S W D SEP Brigida Cipriano FINAL ADDRESS STREET ADDRESS, INCLUDE-IN CARE OF & APT# IF APPLICABLE CITY, STATE, AND ZIP CODE, IF AVAILABLE IN THE UNITED STATES 15638 Amar Rd. Apt B La Puente CA 91744 SEC. 212(a)(14) OCCUPATION SEX / LABOR CERTIFICATION NOT APPLICABLE NOT REQUIRED ATTACHED Shoemaker PCR F This visa is issued under Section 221 of the Immigration and Nationality Act, and upon the basis of the facts stated in the application. Possession of a visa does not entitle the bearer to enter the United States if at the time he seeks to enter he is found to be inadmissible. Upon arrival in the United States, it must be surrendered to a United States Immigration Officer. IMMIGRANT CLASSIFICATION CLASSIFICATION SYMBOL AMERICAN Embassy IR-5 FOREIGN STATE/OTHER AREA LIMITATION AT San Salvador IMMIGRANT VISA NO.
